name: ShadowRunner
description:
Ever thought of playing around with your shadows?

Try this retro style pixel art game. A little scary? Maybe. BUT a lot of fun once you dive into.

Highlights:

* Multiple scene set with random layout

* A lot of detail

* Easy game control

* Random levels

* Different characters

* Simple gameplay but a lot of fun

Try to collect 100 coins in one game!

If you like this game and want to play it on mobile, you may find it on

App Store

https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1163242567

or Google Play

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....
